history.proof: intros H. destruct n. - apply H. - simpl. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment f : R -> R n : nat a, x : R H : ex_derive_n f (S n) x Unable to unify "match ?M2368 with | 0%nat => True | S n => ex_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => ?M2369 * ?M2367 y) n) ?M2370 end" with "exists l : R_NormedModule, is_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => f y * a) n) x l".
In environment f : R -> R n : nat a, x : R H : ex_derive_n f (S n) x Unable to unify "ex_derive_n f (S n) x" with "ex_derive (Derive_n (fun y : R => f y * a) n) x".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
f: R -> R
n: nat
x: R
a: R

Goal:
ex_derive_n f n x -> ex_derive_n (fun y : R => f y * a) n x

Premises:
ex_derive_n = fun (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_AbsRing) => match n with | 0%nat => True | S n0 => ex_derive (Derive_n f n0) x end : (R -> R) -> nat -> R_AbsRing -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope _]
*** [ R : Set ]
ex_derive_n_scal_l : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (a x : R), ex_derive_n f n x -> ex_derive_n (fun y : R => a * f y) n x
ex_derive_n_plus : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) -> locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) -> ex_derive_n (fun x0 : R => f x0 + g x0) n x
ex_derive_n_minus : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) -> locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) -> ex_derive_n (fun x0 : R => f x0 - g x0) n x
Derive_n_minus : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) -> locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) -> Derive_n (fun x0 : R => f x0 - g x0) n x = Derive_n f n x - Derive_n g n x
Derive_n_plus : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) -> locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) -> Derive_n (fun x0 : R => f x0 + g x0) n x = Derive_n f n x + Derive_n g n x
ex_derive_n_opp : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), ex_derive_n f n x -> ex_derive_n (fun x0 : R => - f x0) n x
is_derive_n_minus : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x lf lg : R), locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) -> locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) -> is_derive_n f n x lf -> is_derive_n g n x lg -> is_derive_n (fun x0 : R => f x0 - g x0) n x (lf - lg)
is_derive_n_plus : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x lf lg : R), locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n f k y) -> locally x (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall k : nat, (k <= n)%nat -> ex_derive_n g k y) -> is_derive_n f n x lf -> is_derive_n g n x lg -> is_derive_n (fun x0 : R => f x0 + g x0) n x (lf + lg)
ex_derive_n_ext : forall (f g : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_AbsRing), (forall t : R, f t = g t) -> ex_derive_n f n x -> ex_derive_n g n x
Derive_n_correct : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive_n f n x -> is_derive_n f n x (Derive_n f n x)
ex_derive_n_ext_loc : forall (f g : R_UniformSpace -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_UniformSpace), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t) -> ex_derive_n f n x -> ex_derive_n g n x
ex_derive_n_sum_n_m : forall (n m : nat) (f : nat -> R -> R) (k : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (n <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> ex_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) n m) k x
Derive_n_scal_l : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (a x : R), Derive_n (fun y : R => a * f y) n x = a * Derive_n f n x
ex_derive_n_sum_n : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> R -> R) (k : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (l <= n)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> ex_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n (fun j : nat => f j y) n) k x
ex_derive_n_iter_plus : forall (l : list ?I) (f0 : ?I -> R -> R) (n0 : nat) (x0 : R), locally x0 (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall (j : ?I) (k : nat), List.In j l -> (k <= n0)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f0 j) k y) -> ex_derive_n (fun y : R => iter Rplus 0 l (fun j : ?I => f0 j y)) n0 x0 where ?I : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- Type]
is_derive_n_sum_n_m : forall (n m : nat) (f : nat -> R -> R) (k : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (n <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> is_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) n m) k x (sum_n_m (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n m)
Derive_n_sum_n : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> R -> R) (k : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (l <= n)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> Derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n (fun j : nat => f j y) n) k x = sum_n (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n
Derive_n_sum_n_m : forall (n m : nat) (f : nat -> R -> R) (k : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (n <= l <= m)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> Derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n_m (fun j : nat => f j y) n m) k x = sum_n_m (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n m
ex_derive_n_const : forall (a : R) (n : nat) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive_n (fun _ : R => a) n x
is_derive_pow : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), is_derive f x l -> is_derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 ^ n) x (INR n * l * f x ^ Init.Nat.pred n)
is_derive_n_sum_n : forall (n : nat) (f : nat -> R -> R) (k : nat) (x : R), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => forall l j : nat, (l <= n)%nat -> (j <= k)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f l) j t) -> is_derive_n (fun y : R => sum_n (fun j : nat => f j y) n) k x (sum_n (fun j : nat => Derive_n (f j) k x) n)
ex_derive_scal : forall (f : R -> R) (k x : R), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive (fun x0 : R => k * f x0) x
is_derive_n_iter_plus : forall (l : list ?I) (f0 : ?I -> R -> R) (n0 : nat) (x0 : R), locally x0 (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall (j : ?I) (k : nat), List.In j l -> (k <= n0)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f0 j) k y) -> is_derive_n (fun y : R => iter Rplus 0 l (fun j : ?I => f0 j y)) n0 x0 (iter Rplus 0 l (fun j : ?I => Derive_n (f0 j) n0 x0)) where ?I : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- Type]
Derive_n_iter_plus : forall (l : list ?I) (f0 : ?I -> R -> R) (n0 : nat) (x0 : R), locally x0 (fun y : R_UniformSpace => forall (j : ?I) (k : nat), List.In j l -> (k <= n0)%nat -> ex_derive_n (f0 j) k y) -> Derive_n (fun y : R => iter Rplus 0 l (fun j : ?I => f0 j y)) n0 x0 = iter Rplus 0 l (fun j : ?I => Derive_n (f0 j) n0 x0) where ?I : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- Type]
is_derive_n_opp : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), is_derive_n f n x l -> is_derive_n (fun x0 : R => - f x0) n x (- l)
Derive_n_opp : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R), Derive_n (fun x0 : R => - f x0) n x = - Derive_n f n x
Dcomp : forall (Df Dg : R -> Prop) (df dg f g : R -> R) (x0 : R), D_in f df Df x0 -> D_in g dg Dg (f x0) -> D_in (fun x : R => g (f x)) (fun x : R => df x * dg (f x)) (Dgf Df Dg f) x0
locally_locally : forall (x0 : ?T) (P : ?T -> Prop), locally x0 P -> locally x0 (fun y : ?T => locally y P) where ?T : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- UniformSpace]
is_derive_n_unique : forall (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R), is_derive_n f n x l -> Derive_n f n x = l
Rmin = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then x else y : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
Rmax = fun x y : R => if Rle_dec x y then y else x : R -> R -> R Argument scopes are [R_scope R_scope]
derivable_pt_lim_fs : forall (An : nat -> R) (x : R) (N : nat), (0 < N)%nat -> derivable_pt_lim (fun y : R => sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => An k * y ^ k) N) x (sum_f_R0 (fun k : nat => INR (S k) * An (S k) * x ^ k) (Init.Nat.pred N))
Derive_plus : forall (f g : R_AbsRing -> R_NormedModule) (x : R_AbsRing), ex_derive f x -> ex_derive g x -> Derive (fun x0 : R => f x0 + g x0) x = Derive f x + Derive g x
derivable_pt_lim_pow : forall (x : R) (n : nat), derivable_pt_lim (fun y : R => y ^ n) x (INR n * x ^ Init.Nat.pred n)
Derive_n = fix Derive_n (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x : R) {struct n} : R := match n with | 0%nat => f x | S n0 => Derive (Derive_n f n0) x end : (R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope]
filterdiff_ext_lin : forall f0 l1 l2 : ?U -> ?V, filterdiff f0 ?F l1 -> (forall y : ?U, l1 y = l2 y) -> filterdiff f0 ?F l2 where ?K : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- AbsRing] ?U : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- NormedModule ?K] ?F : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- (?U -> Prop) -> Prop] ?FF : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- Filter ?F]
Derive_n_ext_loc : forall (f g : R_UniformSpace -> R) (n : nat) (x : R_UniformSpace), locally x (fun t : R_UniformSpace => f t = g t) -> Derive_n f n x = Derive_n g n x
is_derive_n = fun (f : R -> R) (n : nat) (x l : R) => match n with | 0%nat => f x = l | S n0 => is_derive (Derive_n f n0) x l end : (R -> R) -> nat -> R -> R -> Prop Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope R_scope R_scope]
prod_f_R0 = fix prod_f_R0 (f : nat -> R) (N : nat) {struct N} : R := match N with | 0%nat => f 0%nat | S p => prod_f_R0 f p * f (S p) end : (nat -> R) -> nat -> R Argument scopes are [function_scope nat_scope]
filterdiff_iter_plus_fct : forall (l : list ?I) (f0 df : ?I -> ?U -> ?V), ?U -> (forall j : ?I, List.In j l -> filterdiff (f0 j) ?F (df j)) -> filterdiff (fun y : ?U => iter plus zero l (fun j : ?I => f0 j y)) ?F (fun x1 : ?U => iter plus zero l (fun j : ?I => df j x1)) where ?K : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- AbsRing] ?U : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- NormedModule ?K] ?V : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- NormedModule ?K] ?I : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- Type] ?F : [f : R -> R n : nat a : R x : R |- (?U -> Prop) ->...-> R n : nat a : R x : R |- Filter ?F]

```coq
intros H.
destruct n.
- exact H.
- simpl. apply ex_derive_n_scal_l. exact H.
Qed.```

original: intros H. destruct n. - apply H. - simpl. apply ex_derive_n_scal_l. apply H.
